text: Congratulations to the nine physicians at the University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences for being named Healthcare Research All-Stars! Their dedication to research and innovation in orthopaedic surgery, gastrointestinal surgery, and general surgery is truly admirable. It's no surprise that UAMS is among the top 1% of hip and knee surgeons nationwide. This recognition is a testament to their hard work and commitment to providing the best possible care for their patients.
